attributes.action: Stop the Mandatory use of Face Masks in Shops, Offices and Public Buildings.
attributes.additional_details:
There is however, scientific proof and medical concern that build up of exhaled waste products and toxins on the inside of a face covering can have detrimental effect and presently unrecognised health implications.
The restriction of oxygen intake can have a range of effects from mild temporary to fatal.
It should not only be those with a physical or mental disability who are exempt. Everyone should be free to make their own informed decision as to health risks.
attributes.background:
There is no scientific evidence or agreement that masks provide any protection to the wearer or others from COVID-19. 
Mandatory use of masks is not justifiable and infringes human rights and civil liberties and should not be
enforced by the threat of refusal of entry or of a large penalty fine.
